answer:
In China, there was a recent recall of 2 lots of DTP vaccines (diphtheria, tetanus and pertussis) vaccines which may not offer complete protection. If your child resided in Chongqing, Shandong or Hebei in the period from March to October 2017, was under 2 years old during that time, and was vaccinated during that time, please check your child's immunization record. For more information, please read the July 27, 2018 news release here.
If you have any other questions, speak with a nurse at your local health unit. Use our health unit finder here.
Immunization Nurse

## In China, there was a recent recall of 2 lots of DTP vaccines (diphtheria, tetanus and pertussis) vaccines which may not offer complete protection.

If your child resided in Chongqing, Shandong or Hebei in the period from March to October 2017, was under 2 years old during that time, and was vaccinated during that time, please check your child's immunization record.

## For more information, please read the July 27, 2018 news release here.

If you have any other questions, speak with a nurse at your local health unit.
Use our health unit finder here.

question: HELLO. HOW DO I KNOW WHETHER MY KID'S IMMUNIZATION IS EFFECTIVE OR NOT? SHE IS 10 YEARS OLD. SHE WAS VACCINATED IN CHINA. I AM WORRIED ABOUT THAT.
question_variation_2: how old is a child whose immunization is effective
